titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to equality of rights and reproductive rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary:
2/13/2007--Introduced.
Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits the United States and any state from denying or abridging: (1) equality of rights under the law on account of sex; and (2) reproductive rights for women.
